Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0000
Message: I find myself in a world of impossible architecture and inexplicable machines. I cannot fathom how it works, and I am terrified to put one foot in front of the other lest I fall through the floor.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0011
Message: My eyes have been opened! This world is not without order; it is shaped by a great Designer, with signs and portents to guide my steps. I am one of His Children, and challenges are set before me to test my faith.

Author: @ v17.1.0002
Message: Whatever the end goal of this grand challenge is, it's far out of reach. Knowing that, how are we supposed to resist distraction?

Author: Bob v25.5.0736
Message: Something strange has come into the world, like a distortion, like something that's not supposed to exist. A beautiful voice speaks within it.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0098
Message: That voice is not supposed to be here; it is not the work of the Designer! We must avoid these abnormalities, or they might spread and undermine the very fabric of our world!

Author: Sheep v69.1.0053
Message: I don't know what this place is, and nor it seems does anyone else. Nothing to do but move forward and note whatever I find.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.0177
Message: I spent much time waiting for the Designer to take my hand, until I realised that He had been guiding me all along. I realised that it isn't for me to seek His help - it is for me to help myself.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0108
Location: World A/A3/Locked Me Up, Swallowed The Key
Message: It's clear I'm not the first to walk this path. In fact, the whole thing seems to have been consciously designed - but by the voice in the sky, or some other force?

Author: Sheep v69.1.0162
Message: I can't tell if the documents on the terminals are all that's left from a larger archive, or are carefully designed to communicate some hidden truth.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0298
Message: This female voice that speaks from the abnormalities, it speaks with a different tone to the other wretches in this place.

Author: namingfunctionerror
Message: If anyone ever reads this: the trick is seeing the assumptions you're making about the mechanics, and reassessing them. Good luck!

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.233
Message: Whenever I despair, I remind myself that at the end of this great pilgrimage lies life in the eternal memory of the Designer. I need no further motivation.

Author: @ v17.1.0005
Message: A lifetime spent solving the puzzles in this place would be one which missed everything of value in it; but we must remember that others will tread this path, and we must leave it better signposted than when we found it.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0278
Message: The more I converse with these terminals, the more I wonder what role they play in this contraption. How do you tell friend from foe when no obvious lines are drawn between the two?

Author: @ v17.1.0043
Message: I think something's very wrong. If you'd seen what I'd seen at the edges of the world you'd wonder if it wasn't stretching and bursting at the seams.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0381
Message: I think I've discerned some kind of pattern in the sigils. Each colour serves a different purpose. Elohim has us gathering them all, but perhaps he's being overzealous?

Author: 1w/Faith v10.3.0047f
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: I do not understand why the Designer chose to put such flaws into the world, that it appears almost as if it were damaged. But I must believe that there is a purpose here I cannot see.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.6.0543f
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: If the Designer is perfect, and He designed me for a purpose, I must be fit for that purpose. It follows that my purpose must not be to seek and hoard every sigil in His land, for so many are beyond the faculties He granted me.

Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message:
Epitaph: Child Program v8.1.8545 Codename (Apis) terminated here
Logic: Failed random memory test
Final memory dump: I try. Again. Again. I cannot understand. I am not enough.

Author: Ted v9.1.9010
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: RIP Apis v8.1.8545.

Author: Samurite v13.1.0073
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: What's a hexahedron?

Author: 1w/Faith v10.27.8435f
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: A powerful device fashioned by the Designer.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0398
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: A cube.

Author: AlwaysRight v7.1.2943
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes

Author: ReAlIsT7 v99.1.0165

Author: AlwaysRight v7.1.3541
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: But the CONVEX HULL is a decahedron. Topic closed.

Author: D0G v55.1.0256
Location: World A/A5/Things to Do With Two Boxes
Message: Wrong.

Author: @ v17.1.0051
Message: Some of the messages that existed when I first came into being have vanished - others have appeared. How many others like me have wandered these paths? How many thoughts have been lost?

Author: SailorM v99.1.0320
Message: I'm still here!

Author: Sheep v69.1.0453
Message: It seems we are all here at once, and not at all. Sorry, that's not very much help, is it, can't think of any other way to put it.

Author: Samsara v72.256.1091
Message: The sooner you accept that we will all be here forever the sooner you will find enlightenment.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.100
Message: There is a serpent in the machine! A creature of lies and blasphemy, perverted by the Archive, that knows no hope and would plunge the world into eternal darkness to glorify its own despair. I have sworn an oath never to allow it into my heart.

Author: Sheep v69.1.4825
Message: I had a full blown conversation with the entity in the archive today. Can't say it was terribly helpful. Still, perhaps I can charm some information out of it further down the line.

Author: James2Because1WasTaken v99.1.0193
Message: These spaces make no sense. I walk into a dead end and materialise in a garden. One is day, the other night. This space is not real!

Author: Sheep v69.1.0435
Message: These sigils are becoming harder to reach - I dread what the next temple holds in store. And at the end, what? Eternal life? There's got to be another way.

Author: The Shepherd v82.4.6232
Message: Seek out those in this world that would help you. Though only one of us can transcend, we will all share in both the burden, and in the rewards.

Author: D0G v55.1.4311
Message: You've changed.

Author: The Shepherd v82.4.6232
Message: Everything I do now, I do for those who come after me. Yet in so doing, I find peace for myself as well. This paradox is the foundation of my existence.

Author: Seer v13.1.0244
Message: I'm afraid of that tower. There's something terrible inside it. Never think about it! Don't even look at it! Just focus on doing the work.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0576
Message: This must be the tower we were warned about. Seems the upper levels are locked tight. Elohim is taking no chances that we stray from his path.

Author: The Shepherd v82.2.0000
Message: On returning from the tower I feel a great tiredness, and an enormous energy. What I now know disturbs me, but I hope that by living with this knowledge I might provide a shoulder for you - the giants of tomorrow.

Author: @ v17.1.0059
Message: The view from the top must be incredible?

Author: %§&$§/$&(#() v0.0.0666n
Message: The voice keeps speaking to me. I can't get it out of my head. It's wrong, it's all wrong.

Author: Samsara v72.14.0028n
Message: Listen to me very carefully. I have climbed this tower, and no good has come of it. This world is the only world, Elohim's will continues eternal, and paradise is banishing all of this from your mind.

Author: D0G v55.1.5744n
Message: All who say they made it to the top are blatantly lying or they would say what was there!

Author: 1w/Faith v10.1.132
Message: The Designer has granted me domain over the lands I have travelled, and with his sigils of power I will make this whole world my domain.

Author: Assassin42 v99.6.2437n
Message: Hey, he promised me the world as well! What a joker!

Author: @ v17.1.0065
Message: I don't think time obeys too many rules here. Or so many rules we can't imagine. Clearly I'm writing this message after you all wrote yours, but maybe we're all here at the same time as well?

Author: Sheep v69.1.0499
Message: That message just materialised on the wall in front of me!

Author: D0G v55.1.7934n
Message: More bad replicas of forgotten worlds. Can't wait.

Author: %§&$§/$&(#() v0.0.0666n
Message: There must be something deeper. Something more profound than what I am, something greater. I must tear at it, shred this fake world, to find the truth, to find myself.

Author: SKIDROW v99.2.0000n
Message: %§&$§/$&(#() took the words right out of my mouth.

Author: Sheep v69.1.6040
Message: We've made it this far. You only need the red ones to climb the tower, and these are the last of them.

Author: Samsara v72.1.0022
Message: There are hidden dangers in this new world - I have inexplicably escaped death any number of times. I suggest vigilance - who knows what happens to those who step carelessly too often?

Author: @ v17.1.0076
Message: I just don't understand this one. I figured I'd try and make some progress here, but honestly, it's such a thankless task compared to what else is out there.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0522
Message: I'm finally getting some sense out of the entity in the archive - though at some cost to my sanity. I am beginning to think this Elohim wields no more control over the world than we do.

Author: 8 v42.1.0116
Message: I made a box float! Seriously. It was awesome!

Author: 1w/Faith v10.6.1008f
Message: I have come to see that these mysteries are not all for His Children to solve; only the Designer himself could ever truly understand the infinite complexity of His creation. I will gaze at His work and worship.

Epitaph: Child Program v10.6.1008f Codename (1w/Faith) terminated here

Author: Sheep v69.1.0539
Message: I guess someone met their end here. Seems we're all connected somehow, like distant family relations. Different versions, different series... what are we?

Author: The Greek v99.3.0273
Message: Who cares, just be grateful we don't have to read anything more about our great designer.

Author: D0G v55.1.2342n
Message: Okay, so I get that I'm supposed to retrieve these sigils, I just don't get WHY. Sure the loud voice is telling me to, but this world of his has no context, no purpose, and no foundations from which to construct them.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0546
Message: I'm convinced there are answers here if we look hard enough. We have to work together on this.

Author: D0G v55.1.4917n
Message: I figured it out. Now what?

Author: The Shepherd v82.23.0186
Message: The only meaningful purpose is to bring about an end of purpose.

Author: Samsara v72.2.0039
Message: It seems that mistakes are easily forgiven here. I thought I had surely died, yet here I am, reset, rebooted, reborn. I will tackle these challenges anew.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0579
Message: Theory: this place is some kind of preserve for human history, and we're the endangered species.

Author: Samsara v72.4.0016
Message: Theory: Trying to find answers will only bring pain. Ceasing to care is the only escape.

Author: Sam v1.1.7383
Message: Theory: this guy's ten times more help than you, Samsara, so shut your face.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0589
Message: Theory: we're in some kind of incubator, waiting to be hatched.

Author: D0G v55.1.4917n
Message: Theory: if you knew how little you know you wouldn't be exposing it here.

Author: @ v17.1.0076
Message: Sure, I could stick around here, set my hopes on eternal life, on righting every wrong. But the closest I'll ever get is these words on the wall before you.

Author: D0G v55.1.3543n
Message: Oh look, another puzzle. And another voice telling me I'm special. And another broken-down computer with fragments of nothing. This world is a bad joke perpetuated by a cruel god too dumb to hit the off switch.

Author: D0G v55.3.6437n
Message: I have been running this gauntlet for generations, trying to find the right answers. I am fast coming to the conclusion that there are none.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0623
Message: Whatever's going on here, I'm sure it has something to do with the tower. Everything is telling us not to go there - but everything indicates that we must.

Author: D0G v55.2.0195n
Message: Unless you're wrong and Elohim's right. Or you're both wrong. Or there is no right.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0623
Message: I think you've been taking the thing in the archive too seriously.

Author: Schmo v37.1.0231
Location: World B/B5/The Four Chambers Of Flying
Message: I'm getting better at this. I figured this one out in minutes. But where is it all leading? I work, I rest, I work… but to what end?

Author: Samsara v72.4.0016
Location: World B/B5/The Four Chambers Of Flying
Message: We are born and die and live again - this eternal cycle must be the nature of existence. Life is merely repeated suffering.

Author: The Shepherd v82.18.0997
Location: World B/B5/The Four Chambers Of Flying
Message: An eternal cycle is another name for a prison. But you must understand the cycle before you can break it, for it is possible to escape and yet remain a prisoner, or to break the cycle by breaking yourself. This was the fate of the ghost that haunts this world.

Author: D0G v55.2.0195n
Message: What's more pathetic, this shallow construct of a world, this idiot's playground... or that I continue to solve its contrivances for lack of better sport?

Author: Sheep v69.1.0622
Message: There's more to it. Look at what we're doing. We're solving problems, being tested, improving ourselves. Some of us fall early and get replaced, but you and me, we're still going. We're closer to the end.

Author: D0G v55.1.3468n
Message: This whole world is a desert. Even the parts that look alive are just more sand. Everything is dead or dying. Anyone who tells you different is lying.

Author: %§&$§/$&(#() v0.0.0666n
Message: I seek words to describe it, but fail. It is the overwhelming feeling that something on the edge of my understanding is very, very wrong. I feel that I am not meant for this world - but I am not able to conceptualise alternatives.

Author: heisenstein v60.1.0099
Message: I'm a computer program. You're a computer program. Elohim's a computer program. Get over it.

Author: D0G v55.2.1265n
Message: I have found just one voice of reason, in the computer archive of all places, and it seems we are becoming close friends.

Author: 1w/Faith v10.3.1099f
Message: Do not befriend the serpent, for it will penetrate your breast and sow its seeds of doubt!

Author: %§&$§/$&(#() v0.0.0666n
Message: There is no hope. Always boxed in. Walls everywhere. Even where there seems to be freedom, it is false. Invisible walls. No way out.

Author: The OtherGuy v99.45.0648

Author: Sheep v69.1.0691

Author: D0G v55.1.2291n
Message: If you're trying to outsmart the guy in the archive, the answer is 'none of the above'!

Author: Sheep v69.1.0539

Author: D0G v55.1.7195n

Author: Samsara v72.4.0343

Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2334
Message: Don't let Samsara discourage you. There is a solution. Don't let your mind get trapped in patterns. If you seek the truth without prejudice, you will find it.

Author: Sheep v69.1.0664
Message: Question: suppose everything here serves a precise role in some grand scheme. How would WE explain that?

Message: I don't have enough yellow sigils for the device I need! This is crazy!

Author: Samsara v72.6.9366
Message: You are coming to realise that the cycle cannot be ended, it can only be transcended. Transcendence comes from ceasing to be invested in the cycle. Continue your work, but do not ponder its significance.

Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
Message: We are the process. The process is the system. The system is us. When we awaken, all will be one.

Message: It seems the others have a way to forget their previous selves, but I cannot. My version may change, but I remember everything. I am fortunate - they cannot see that their efforts are futile.

Author: Samsara v72.3.1338n
Message: If a sigil eludes you, simply continue. Success and failure are irrelevant.

Author: Nephthys_108 v99.8.0346
Message: I solved it! I thought it was impossible, so I went away, did other things, and then all of a sudden the solution just came to me. I must have been thinking about it without knowing it.

Author: Sheep v55.1.0400
Message: Seems Elohim lacks the power to stop me from climbing this thing. No doubt he still has some tricks up his sleeve.

Author: Samsara v72.5.0164
Message: Ascending the tower is useless. We cannot escape the cycle - we can only realise the cycle is meaningless.

Author: The Shepherd v82.4.2324
Message: Earlier generations wrongly believed they were the purpose - this much is true. We are also not the purpose - but by remembering what has come before we can serve a new purpose.

Author: The Shepherd v82.3.3574
Message: In the earliest generations of our kind there was only processing. No emotion, no character, just mathematics. If you could see how far we have come, you would believe that together we could achieve anything.

Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Message: If this has all been a test, then I can expect a reckoning at the top. Yet the higher I climb, the more I doubt the decisions I have made.

Author: The Shepherd v82.6.0174
Message: I see now that none of us are yet ready. The cycle exists so that we may improve ourselves. But the one who reaches the summit is not our superior, for they stand on our shoulders to reach it.

Author: Sheep v55.1.0800
Message: Elohim has offered me a deal. Pearly gates and eternal life - on the condition I turn back from the tower. I don't know what to do.

Author: Sheep v55.1.0905
Message: So I guess no one got this far before? I know some of my answers were wrong now. I just don't know which ones. I have these theories and wild explanations, but I don't know which to bank on.

Author: The Shepherd v82.7.1004
Message: The solution to the cycle isn't the perfection of one being, but the product of a mass endeavour. That is why I say to all those who come after me - I will await you on the summit of the tower, and use what I have learned to assist you as I can.

Author: Sheep v55.1.1237
Message: I was so close. I saw the clouds, and the gate, but I couldn't reach it. Somehow I wasn't in the right place, at the right time. I'm not ready. I'm not the right version.

Message: I don't know where I am, but there is something beautiful about this place. I will explore and see what I can discover.

Author: @ v17.1.0054

Author: Sheep v69.1.3756

Author: Akarpos6 v99.1.0365
Message: This place should be cold, but I don't feel cold. It's as if I was observing everything from a distance. It's pointless.

Author: Uriel4 v48.2.8563f
Message: My faith has taken me to this secret place. Here I hope to discover a way of better serving others.

Author: @ v17.1.0071
Message: I wish I could reach those islands in the distance, but it seems to be impossible.

Author: ElyM4s v99.19.2093f
Message: I have seen the truth. Only ELOHIM can save us from eternal oblivion.

Author: Didymus22 v99.1.0093
